entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
